text: (Dutare,) granthadavaru nim'modane, tamagagi akasadinda ondu granthavannu ilisikodabekendu agrahisuttiddare. I hinde avaru musara munde idakkinta dodda agrahagalannu mandisiddaru mattu ‘‘namage vyaktavagi allahanannu torisi kodiri’’ endiddaru. Konege, avara akramagala karana avara mele sidileragi bittitu. Munde, tam'ma balige bahala spasta puravegalu banda balikavu avaru karuvannu (devaragi) neccikondaru. Istiddu navu avarannu ksamisidevu mattu musarige bahala spastavada prabalyavannu nididevu
